TopicTitle: Feature for people who play KSP on steam

Articles.Content: Steam has a feature called the Steam Cloud. If you make your game compatible with Steam Cloud, players would be able to save their game to the cloud as well as on their PC or MAC. This way if they have to reinstall their Steam for some reason (like I have had to do recently) they won't lose their saves like I did, including one I had for my YouTube series.
